about.title: Frontend developer with experience creating modern web applications
about.description: My name is Amirjani Faizmukhamad. I have over a year of experience in development. I possess deep knowledge and skills in creating modern, responsive, and high-performance web applications. I specialize in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, and React. I actively use Redux for state management and Next.js for server-side rendering and creating dynamic web pages. I have implemented many projects using these technologies. I am proficient in working with PostgreSQL for creating and managing databases in web applications. Throughout my career, I have developed numerous websites, focusing on their performance, responsiveness, and usability.
